## hpr2646 :: Liverpool Makefest 2018 - Interview with Steve and Gerrard from the Liverpool Astronomical society.

 In this episode I talk to Steve and Gerard from the Liverpool Astronomical society.

https://liverpoolas.org/event/weekly-public-meeting-at-the-leighton-observatory-pex-hill-4/2018-09-26/
https://liverpoolas.org/
https://lpoolmakefest.org/
